    Prepare to migrate VMware workloads to Azure by deploying Azure VMware Solution - Deploy Azure VMware Solution

    »

    1. At a minimum, which role is required at the subscription level to deploy Azure VMware Solution?

      Virtual Machine Contributor

      Owner

      Contributor


    2. Which planning step is required to deploy Azure VMware Solution in the Azure portal?

      Create a resource lock.

      Register the Microsoft.AVS resource provider.

      A service principal
